sentence: Four other congressional candidates also attended Trump's rally: Audra Johnson, who's challenging Republican Peter Meijer in Michigan's 3rd District, Annie Black in Nevada's 4th District, Jo Rae Perkins, a Republican Senate candidate in Oregon linked to the QAnon conspiracy group and Colorado State Representative Ron Hanks, who's running for Colorado's U.S. Senate seat.
author: Aaron Navarro
title: Over 30 people who rallied in Washington on January 6, 2021 are running for state and federal offices

sentence: Rep. Peter Meijer, R-Mich., brought in eight times what his Trump-endorsed primary challenger secured last quarter, while Rep. Fred Upton, R-Mich., raised more than five times what Trump-backed state Rep. Steve Carra brought in from October through December.
title: Overnight News Digest February 1, 2022

sentence: Fellow Michigan Republican Rep. Peter Meijer raised $529,000.
title: House Republicans close money gap in hunt for the majority

sentence: Rep. Peter Meijer, R-Mich., brought in eight times what his Trump-endorsed primary challenger secured last quarter, while Rep. Fred Upton, R-Mich., raised more than five times what Trump-backed state Rep. Steve Carra brought in from October through December.
title: Republicans who impeached Trump outpace challengers in latest fundraising haul

sentence: NBC News points out that Rep. Peter Meijer (R-Mich.) hauled in over eight times what his Trump-endorsed challenger did in the fourth quarter.
author: William Vaillancourt
title: Republicans Who Voted to Impeach Trump Are Fundraising Laps Around Their MAGA Primary Opponents

sentence: Michigan Rep. Peter Meijer raised $553,000, compared to the $123,000 raised by opponent John Gibbs, a former acting assistant secretary in the Department of Housing and Urban Development in the Trump administration.
author: Herb Jackson
title: Trump targets outraise challengers, unlike some other incumbents
